alert.note: Alert for Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 12:14PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Nueces, southwestern San Patricio and northeastern Jim Wells Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1213 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bluntzer to near Banquete to 7 miles west of Driscoll. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bishop, Orange Grove, San Patricio, Alfred-South La Paloma, Calallen, Bluntzer, Banquete, Edroy and Agua Dulce. This includes Interstate 37 between mile markers 15 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells
